search_rules.name: Find 1KBP0059 and log A, B, C
Find NXT2277 and log A, B, C

notes.description: Configuration for single-column Excel search script
notes.name: Optional: A descriptive name for the rule (for tracking in logs)
notes.search_column: The column to search for the target value (e.g., 'M', 'A', 'BK')
notes.search_value: The value to find in the search_column
notes.log_columns: Array of column letters to log when match is found (e.g., ['A', 'B', 'C'])
notes.enabled: Set to false to disable a rule without deleting it
